trans-unit.source: Changes that might occur to a file or directory.
trans-unit.target: Modifiche che potrebbero verificarsi in un file o directory.

trans-unit.source: Each WatcherChangeTypes member is associated with an event in <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>.
trans-unit.target: Ogni membro WatcherChangeTypes Ã¨ associato a un evento in <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the events, see <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created>, <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted>, <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed>, and <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Renamed>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sugli eventi, vedere <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created>, <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted>, <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed>e <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Renamed>.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Renamed> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created>

trans-unit.source: The creation, deletion, change, or renaming of a file or folder.
trans-unit.target: La creazione, eliminazione, modifica o ridenominazione di un file o cartella.

trans-unit.source: The change of a file or folder.
trans-unit.target: La modifica di un file o cartella.

trans-unit.source: The types of changes include: changes to size, attributes, security settings, last write, and last access time.
trans-unit.target: I tipi di modifiche includono: modifica di dimensioni, attributi, le impostazioni di sicurezza, dell'ultima scrittura e ora dell'ultimo accesso.

trans-unit.source: The creation of a file or folder.
trans-unit.target: La creazione di un file o cartella.

trans-unit.source: The deletion of a file or folder.
trans-unit.target: L'eliminazione di un file o cartella.

trans-unit.source: The renaming of a file or folder.
trans-unit.target: La ridenominazione di un file o cartella.
